This course is perfect for students who want to learn how to create websites from scratch or improve their existing skills.

Introduction to Web Development

in this section, we will be discussing the basics of a web designing course and some of the essential skills. We will also be providing some tips on how to choose the right web development course for you.

Web design is the process of creating and maintaining websites. It involves a lot of different aspects, such as website design, web content development, server-side scripting, client-side scripting, and database management.

As a web designer, you need to have a good understanding of all these different aspects in order to be able to create a successful website.

The first step in becoming a web developer is to choose the right web development course. There are many different courses available, so it is important to find one that suits your needs and interests.

If you are interested in learning about all aspects of web development, then you should enroll in a comprehensive course that covers everything from website design to server-side scripting. However, if you only want to focus on one specific aspect of web development, such as website design course, then you can enroll in a course that only covers that topic.

Once you have chosen the right course, it is time to start learning!

Business Owners

course_content:
Welcome to Nice Computer Institute, your premier destination for Tally Prime training in Jahangirpuri.

About the Tally Prime Course:

Discover a comprehensive Tally Prime course designed to equip you with essential skills in Tally Prime, a widely-used accounting software. Our program covers key aspects such as Tally Prime features, GST implementation, and practical accounting applications.

Key Features of Our Tally Prime Course:

  • Hands-on Training: Learn through practical experience with the Tally Prime software.
  • Expert Guidance: Benefit from the expertise of experienced instructors.
  • GST Implementation: Gain in-depth knowledge and skills in implementing GST.
  • Real-world Projects: Apply your learning to real-world accounting scenarios and projects.
  • Interactive Learning: Engage in an interactive and supportive learning environment.
  • Placement Assistance: Access placement assistance for successful course completion.

Course Curriculum:

Our Tally Prime course covers a range of topics, including:

  • Introduction to Tally Prime
  • Basic and Advanced Accounting in Tally
  • GST Setup and Implementation
  • Tally Prime Features and Functions
  • Practical Applications and Case Studies

Enrollment Information:

Ready to enhance your accounting skills with Tally Prime? Enroll in our course today. For details on course fees, schedules, and enrollment, please contact us:

  • Email: nicewebtechnologies@gmail.com
  • Phone: 9312945741

Tally Institute in Jahangirpuri course at Nice Web Technologies module contain:

  1. Accountancy Management– At Nice Computer Institute you get to study Basics of Accountancy, Balancing Methods, Foreign Currency, Interest calculation, Cost Categories & Cost Centers. Budgets, Bank Reconciliation, Cheque management, Reversing Journal & Memorandum vouchers & MIS Reporting
  2. Inventory Management–Nice Computer Institute Item Creation, Multi Unit, Go-down, Batch-wise entries, Quotation, Order, Challan, Delivery, Expired Item Details, Transfer of material, Stock Categories, Bill of material, Price -list, Tracking, Rejection inward -outward & MIS Reporting
  3. Taxation– Also you learn complete tally with GST (Intra-State & Inter-State), Multi GST Billing, TDS, TCS, Service Tax, Excise & MIS Reporting.
  4. Payroll– Employee creation, Group, Attendance, Leave, Salary- Slip Creation, MIS-Reporting.

Tally, recognized as one of the most primitive software solutions, has endured the test of time, dedicating over 20+ years to refining technology for the benefit of small and medium businesses. Through daring pursuits of unconventional ideas, addressing unthinkable scenarios, and resolving everyday business challenges, Tally consistently provides solutions that not only simplify life but also foster business growth.

Simultaneously, Nice Computer Institute seamlessly integrates Tally into its curriculum, ensuring students not only acquire proficiency in the software but also grasp the intricacies of accountancy associated with it. Additionally, transcending traditional education, the institute actively facilitates the initial steps of students’ professional journeys by offering first job placement opportunities.

By creating a comprehensive learning environment, Nice Computer Institute empowers students with both the technical prowess of Tally and the practical insights necessary for a successful career placement. Essentially, the institute acts as a bridge, connecting theoretical knowledge with real-world applications and opening doors to promising career paths for its students.
